nodes.text: Forces of Destiny: The Rey Chronicles

Forces of Destiny: The Rey Chronicles is a chapter book based on the animated micro-series Star Wars: Forces of Destiny. Written by Emma Carlson Berne, the book adapts episodes from Forces of Destiny and adds original scenes. The Rey Chronicles was published by Disney–Lucasfilm Press on March 6, 2018.
The choices we make, the actions we take, the moments—both big and small—shape us into FORCES OF DESTINY!
This chapter book, based on the all-new animated micro-series spotlighting some of Star Wars' greatest heroes, features three exciting stories about the scavenger-turned-Resistance hero, Rey!
The book adapts three episodes of the micro-series Star Wars: Forces of Destiny: Tracker Trouble, The Happabore Hazard and Run Rey Run, with additional scenes and introductions by Maz Kanata.
